body: This is one of those best doujins about Danganronpa I've read so far. The artist concept is great and it kinda fits the actual story on what would have happened b/w between Taeko and Yamada before he got killed by her. 10/10 for this masterpiece
Monotaro goes to Burger King. And later he goes back to home from Burger King.
I think I need to talk to Monokuma....👉👈
So glad i'm stumble upon this

@FangOfDrknss Mediocrity exists in every profession, not just art. So, get of your high horse and stop treating artists who just want to make a living like this. It's true, being an artist isn't all it's cracked up to be, and it does take a lot of luck. But, that doesn't mean you don't try to do something with it, if it's something you're truly passionate about. I wish you and so many other people could understand that, but it just doesn't seem like you can. But at least I was able to get my frustration out by typing these comments.
@FangOfDrknss Why can't you give artists a chance to prove themselves, before calling them mediocre?

@FangOfDrknss It's too bad you don't seem to love artists, and you like to pity them more than support them. Being an artist may be hard, but that doesn't mean you treat them like this: "There are tons of mediocre artists in the world. It’s like the worst career you can pick next to singing. I commission a lot and even with tipping, the artist I frequent makes $80-100 at best. But she’s married and has other financial support, so she’s one of the lucky ones."
what was kirigiri brooding on, i wonder
Fucking love all these doujins making connections to the actual story.
lmao dat cover picture cracks me up
If only Danganronpa was an eroge then this might be the H-Scene which i think is kinda fits to the overall story,unlike those mana transfering they did on Fate/Stay Night
kkkkkk gordo sempre se fode pqp
